item.title: Comment on Honest Review: The Best WordPress Hosting for 2020 by Harry Lang
item.dc:creator: Harry Lang
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2020/04/05/honest-review-best-wordpress-hosting-for-2020/#comment-30">Connor</a>.
Nice! I might have a look at this to update this review in future.

In reply to Connor.

Nice! I might have a look at this to update this review in future.

item.title: Comment on Honest Review: The Best WordPress Hosting for 2020 by Connor
item.dc:creator: Connor
item.description: As our traffic continued to grow and site speed became more and more important (both for SEO and for our user experience), we recently switched WPShout s hosting from SiteGround to Kinsta. We have a full review coming on that experience, but for now here s what we can say for sure. The hosting offering is outstanding overall: very easy-to-manage WordPress staging and install flows, automatic daily backups, a free CDN, free SSL certificates through Let s Encrypt, and so on.
item.content:encoded: As our traffic continued to grow and site speed became more and more important (both for SEO and for our user experience), we recently switched WPShout s hosting from SiteGround to Kinsta. We have a full review coming on that experience, but for now here s what we can say for sure. The hosting offering is outstanding overall: very easy-to-manage WordPress staging and install flows, automatic daily backups, a free CDN, free SSL certificates through Let s Encrypt, and so on.
